name: unjointed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having no joints and not able to bend: This curious-looking dinosaur has distinctive short, unjointed pectoral fins. Although jointed types tend to fetch more money, this very old and very rare, unjointed teddy bear is expected to attract a lot of interest at auction. Opposite
jointed
More examplesFewer examplesThe poor man's little finger was unjointed as part of a genetic deformation.The thick triangular stems of the plant divide into sets of three at nodes but are otherwise unjointed.They supply a range of unjointed clay pipes and fittings.
